articles.author: nutraingredients-asia.com
articles.title: Improving outcomes: Vitamin, probiotic supplementation pre-conception has major potential to boost long-term infant health - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: Nutritional supplementation taken at the stage of pre-conception by a mother has major potential to improve the long-term health of children, according to results from cross-country research.
articles.content: The study, dubbed the Nutritional Intervention Preconception and during Pregnancy to maintain Healthy Glucose Metabolism and Offspring Health or NiPPer trial was conducted by scientists from the Nati… [+3254 chars]
